snippet: As the country absorbs yet another mass shooting, both supporters and opponents of stricter gun laws are asking whether the carnage might change a trajectory toward fewer restrictions.
abstract: Supporters and opponents of stricter gun laws, all stunned by Newtown, Conn, massacre, are beginning to ask whether carnage might change nation's general trajectory toward less gun control; some gun control advocates say they hope shooting will be catalyst for change toward greater restrictions on firearms.
lead_paragraph: As the country absorbs yet another mass shooting, both supporters and opponents of stricter gun laws are asking whether the carnage might change a trajectory toward fewer restrictions.

headline.seo: Connecticut Shooting Revives Gun Control Debate
headline.main: Debate on Gun Control Is Revived, Amid a Trend Toward Fewer Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Debate on Gun Control Is Revived, Amid a Trend Toward Fewer Restrictions

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence
